  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2447</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2447</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Francès segon idioma</string>
            <string language="en">French as a second language</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Franzosen als zweite Sprache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français comme deuxième langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês como uma segunda língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese come secondo linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικά ως δεύτερη γλώσσα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina web de l'IES Enric Borràs de Badalona amb informació exhaustiva sobre les  programacions (ESO i Batxillerat), les activitats i les infraestructures destinades a l'ensenyament del francès. Conté també uns enllaços amb diverses fonts d'informació sobre ensenyament i un fòrum.</string>
            <string language="en">Webpage of Enric Borràs Secondary School in Badalona with extensive information on study programmes (12-18 years old), and on activities and material for learning French. It also includes links to different sources of information on education and a forum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">activitats extraescolars</string>
            <string language="en">extracurricular activities</string>
            <string language="es">actividades extraescolares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">intercanvi d'alumnes</string>
            <string language="en">pupil exchange</string>
            <string language="es">intercambio de alumnos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segona llengua estrangera</string>
            <string language="en">second foreign language</string>
            <string language="es">segunda lengua extranjera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">viatge d'estudis</string>
            <string language="en">study trip</string>
            <string language="es">viaje de estudios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">pedagogia per objectius</string>
            <string language="en">teaching by objectives</string>
            <string language="es">pedagogía por objetivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseite Enric Borràs der Sekundärschule in 
Badalona mit umfangreichen Informationen über Studie Programme (12-18
Jahre alt) und über Aktivitäten und Material für erlernenfranzosen.
Sie schließt auch Links zu den unterschiedlichen Quellen der 
Informationen über Ausbildung und ein Forum ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web d'école secondaire d'Enric Borràs 
dans Badalona avec l'information étendue sur des programmes d'étude 
(12-18 ans de ), et sur les activités et le matériel pour le 
Français d'étude. Elle inclut également des liens à 
différentes sources d'information sur l'éducation et un forum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page da escola secundária de Enric Borràs 
em Badalona com informação extensiva em programas do estudo (12-18 
anos velho), e em atividades e em material para o francês de 
aprendizagem. Inclui também as ligações às fontes diferentes
da informação na instrução e em um forum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page della scuola secondaria di Enric Borràs
in Badalona con le vaste informazioni sui programmi di studio (vecchio
12-18 anni) e sulle attività e sul materiale per il francese 
imparante. Egualmente include i collegamenti alle sorgenti 
differenti delle informazioni su formazione e su una tribuna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webpage της δευτεροβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης Enric 
Borrΰs badalona με τις εκτενείς πληροφορίες για τα 
προγράμματα μελέτης (12-18 ετών), και για τις δραστηριότητες 
και το υλικό για την εκμάθηση των γαλλικών. Περιλαμβάνει 
επίσης τις συνδέσεις με τις διαφορετικές πηγές πληροφοριών για 
την εκπαίδευση και ένα φόρουμ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">extrakurrikulare Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupilleaustausch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">an zweiter Stelle Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studienreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht durch Lernziele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités hors-programme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">échange de pupille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue en second lieu étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyage d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement par des objectifs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua em segundo extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento dagli obiettivi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
